Evaluate price ladders, understand price index and elasticities. Understand how consumers respond to change in price. Measure of how sensitive the quantity demanded of a good is to changes in its price. Used to identify substitutes and complements.

Perform Price Point Optimization. Leverage Brandwise Subcategory level elasticity, Cross-price elasticity, volume share vs profit to understand how to best optimize value and volume share by tweaking price. Compare various scenarios and choose the best price change to get the desired result.
Use the Price Guidance to create a plan
